List of biomarkers:

1.    Demographics and clinical history:

-  Age *x*
-  Sex
-  Race *x*
-  BMI
•    Prior cancer history
•    Family history of cancer
•    Diagnosis of diabetes
•    Menstrual status

2. Histopathology results:
-  Tumor size
-  Histology designations  *x*
•    Tumor grade  *x*
•    Cancer stage *x*
•    Lymph node stage
•    Metastasis stage

3. Test results for molecular markers or their immunohistochemistry 
surrogates:
•    EGFR protein
•    Cytokeratin 5/6 (CK 5/6)
•    ER/PR
•    HER1
•    HER2
•    TP53
•    CA-125
•    Prostate-specific antigen (PSA)
•    KRAS
•    ERBB2
•    UGT-1A
•    EML4
•    ALK
•    BRCA

4. Clinical events related to cancer treatment, survival and outcomes:
•    Surgery
•    Chemotherapy (including prescribed medication)
•    Radiation therapy
•    Cancer recurrence
•    Patient death
